title: Region bounded by sinx, cosx, and y-axis

content.question: Let R be the shaded region in the first quadrant enclosed by the y-axis and the graphs of y = sin x and y = cos x, as shown in the figure above. (a) Find the area of R.

frqParts.text: Let R be the shaded region in the first quadrant enclosed by the y-axis and the graphs of y = sin x and y = cos x, as shown in the figure above. (a) Find the area of R.
(b) Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the x-axis.
(c) Find the volume of the solid whose base is R and whose cross sections cut by planes perpendicular to the x-axis are squares.

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
